price: no pronuncia palabra alguna sin que a su lado esté presente un ángel observador que la registre.
arabic: مَّا يَلۡفِظُ مِن قَوۡلٍ إِلَّا لَدَيۡهِ رَقِيبٌ عَتِيدٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: mā yalfiẓu min qawlin illā ladayhi raqībun ʿatīdun
